title: 'Goosebumps' spooks 'Spies,' 'Crimson Peak' at box office
text:
> Entertainment 'Goosebumps' spooks 'Spies,''Crimson Peak' at box office In this photo provided by Columbia Pictures, Jack Black who stars as R.L. Stine, Slappy, and Invisible Boy, appears in a scene in Columbia Pictures' "Goosebumps." (Hopper Stone, SMPSP/Columbia Pictures via AP)
